tableLayout.default: 无固定表头/列或使用了 column.ellipsis 时，默认值为 fixed
tableLayout.description_zh: 表格元素的 table-layout 属性，设为 fixed 表示内容不会影响列的布局

bordered.description: Whether to show all table borders
bordered.description_zh: 是否展示外边框和列边框

childrenColumnName.description: The column contains children to display

columns.description_zh: 表格列的配置描述，具体项见下表

:components.description_zh: 覆盖默认的 table 元素

dataSource.description: Data record array to be displayed

defaultExpandAllRows.description_zh: 初始时，是否展开所有行

expandedRowKeys.description: Current expanded row keys. Can be used with .sync, see update:expandedRowKeys.
expandedRowKeys.description_zh: 展开的行，控制属性。可用 .sync 后缀, 参见 update:expandedRowKeys

expandedRowRender.type: Function(record, index, indent, expanded):VNode | slot="expandedRowRender" slot-scope="record, index, indent, expanded"
expandedRowRender.description: Expanded container render for each row

expandRowByClick.description: Whether to expand row by clicking anywhere in the whole row
expandRowByClick.description_zh: 通过点击行来展开子行

:expandIconColumnIndex.description: The index of expandIcon which column will be inserted when expandIconAsCell is false
:expandIconColumnIndex.description_zh: 展开的图标显示在哪一列，如果没有 rowSelection，默认显示在第一列，否则显示在选择框后面

:indentSize.description: Indent size in pixels of tree data
:indentSize.description_zh: 展示树形数据时，每层缩进的宽度，以 px 为单位

:locale.default: filterConfirm: '确定'  filterReset: '重置'  emptyText: '暂无数据'
:locale.description: i18n text including filter, sort, empty text, etc
:locale.description_zh: 默认文案设置，目前包括排序、过滤、空数据文案

:pagination.description: Config of pagination. You can ref table pagination config or full pagination document, hide it by setting it to false
:pagination.description_zh: 分页器，参考配置项或 pagination文档，设为 false 时不展示和进行分页

rowKey.description: Row's unique key, could be a string or function that returns a string
rowKey.description_zh: 表格行 key 的取值，可以是字符串或一个函数

:rowSelection.description_zh: 列表项是否可选择，配置项

scroll.description: Set horizontal or vertical scrolling, can also be used to specify the width and height of the scroll area. It is recommended to set a number for x, if you want to set it to true, you need to add style .ant-table td { white-space: nowrap; }.
scroll.description_zh: 设置横向或纵向滚动，也可用于指定滚动区域的宽和高，建议为 x 设置一个数字，如果要设置为 true，需要配合样式 .ant-table td { white-space: nowrap; }

customHeaderRow.description: Set props on per header row

getPopupContainer.description: the render container of dropdowns in table
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置表格内各类浮层的渲染节点，如筛选菜单

transformCellText.type: Function({ text, column, record, index }) => any
transformCellText.description: Data can be changed again before rendering. The default configuration of general user empty data. You can configured globally through ConfigProvider
transformCellText.description_zh: 数据渲染前可以再次改变，一般用户空数据的默认配置，可以通过 ConfigProvider 全局统一配置

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when there are changes in pagination, sorting, and filtering
events.description_zh: 分页、排序、筛选变化时触发

events.name: expand
events.description: Triggered when the expand icon is clicked

events.name: expandedRowsChange
events.description: Triggered when the expanded row changes
